thread.title_full: Affordable, clean and modern hotel not to far from downtown - Review of Home2 Suites by Hilton New York Long Island City/ Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ern_H_can
title: Affordable, clean and modern hotel not to far from downtown
text: You will easily save about half of what you would spend on a hotel in Manhattan and you wouldn't get breakfast included. It's a new hotel that is about 100 meters from the 39 train which will take you downtown in under 20 minutes. The staff are polite, rooms are spacious and if your hungry Nick's pizza is about 100 meters south of you or head to 36th street for some nice little restaurants and bars.
